version_description:
- Fresh new look. We redesigned and simplified SugarSync to make it easier than ever to use and be more consistent with our newest desktop application.
- All your folders in one place. Your folders and those shared with you are all now in the Folders tab.
- Swipe actions added. You can now swipe left on items to access actions such as save offline, share, copy, and delete.

- Improved resolution and screen utilization for iPhone 6+
- Bug fix for SugarSync location services becomes unchecked on iOS 8.1
- Bug fix for downloading thumbnails
- Other bug fixes

- Added Seek Bar feature to music player
- 64-bit compatibility
- Minor UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- Compatibility with iOS 9
- Improvements to the Photo Gallery for your viewing pleasure
- Assorted bug fixes

- Compatibility with iOS 9
- Improvements to the Photo Gallery for your viewing pleasure
- Assorted bug fixes

- Compatibility with iOS 9
- Improvements to the Photo Gallery for your viewing pleasure
- Assorted bug fixes

New Features:
- "Clean My Device" allows you to free up storage on your mobile device by uploading all of your photos and videos into SugarSync and deleting them from your phone, freeing up precious storage space.
** NOTE - You will need to reupload all of your pictures and videos again to use the Clean My Device feature **
- Use TouchID instead of a PIN code to keep your data even more secure!

Improvements:
- Redesigned search pane, new icons and folders
- Added thumbnails to show you which item is being uploaded by Camera Backup, added ability to sort by most recent photos in Camera backup folder
- Lots of bug fixes

This is a small release that updates the Truste Logo
Stay tuned for some exciting new things coming soon!

New Features:
- Support for iOS11 and the ability to access your SugarSync files & folders within the new Files app
- Added Force Touch support for quick access to Clean out my device, Photos and Offline content
- Added notifications for subscription changes
- Added shortcut to status bar to see which photos/videos are uploading

Improvements:
- New analytic engine
- Streamlined the signup experience
- Fixed the app from crashing

Improvements:
- iPhone X support
- FaceID support
- Format changes for accounts with > 1TB of space
- Show music in control center while playing
- Show music on lock screen while playing
- Uniform layout of CLOSE button throughout app
- Fixed the app from crashing
- Fixed rating link
- Fixed keyboard not hiding after searching

Improvements:
• Support for remote wipe
• Fix for Excel files with background colors
• Fix for not streaming some audio files
• Fix for thumbnails not showing in Photos section
• UI updates when changing orientation taking photos
• Crash fixes

Improvements:
- Fixed crash when toggling PIN switch
- Updates to Analytic platform
- Updates to Push Notifications
- Updates to sign up flow to align with GDPR
- Removed unused assets in app

Improvements:
• Support for remote wipe
• Fix for Excel files with background colors
• Fix for not streaming some audio files
• Fix for thumbnails not showing in Photos section
• UI updates when changing orientation taking photos
• Crash fixes

• Protected Folders comes to iOS
• Protect new folders
• Manage existing folders
• Restore corrupt data
• Support for Shorcuts in iOS12
• Fixed Open In functionality
• Crash fixes

• Improvements to pin code security
• Improvements to search showing where files are located
• Improvements to automatic photo uploads
• Improvements to sharing more file types to SugarSync
• Keychain support for complex passwords

• New look and feel across all of our apps
• Recent activity shows an overview of your file activity
• Shortcuts allow you to group commonly accessed files and folders in one easy place
• Added support for viewing HEIC files
• Fixed a renaming issue when uploading files through the share action

• New layout for iPads to better use the extra screen space
• Updated SDKs under the hood

• Support for Accessibility font sizes
• Search results improvements
• Various UI improvements

• Two Factor Authentication 
• Fixed an issue with PIN locks
Crash fixes
